name: Remainder Matters
description:
( This is a early alpha build )   - Remainder Matters is a small puzzle game I designed as a fathers day gift to my dad                                                    

The concept is to push bricks in the style of a Sokobon game,  anytime you push a number brick the brick looses a number, the goal is to fill all end points on the side with matching numbers from a  brick.

You can not push a brick in the same direction that you just came from and there are Math bricks that apply the effects ( Add,  Sub, Multi, Divide)  as you push a brick past them

There are currently only  5 levels in the game as I wanted to have this uploaded on fathers day,  Over the course of the next few weeks I will be pushing a few updates adding more puzzles

There are two known bugs

-  the colliders on the left side where the remainder end spots spawn  had to be disabled so try to not push past them though you can always reset with Spacebar/R

-  If you solve a puzzle, the number for the winning number does not clear and can be used as a win condition on the following puzzle

-- bugs will be patched with the first update when I add more puzzles
